requestBody.title: Owner reviews consolidated calendar state API Trace

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Hold seats while paying (10-minute reservation)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Matching engine path that can resolve “any host” style requirements cleanly". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
